00066     template <typename DR>
00067     class RCondDeleter {
00068     public:
00069        RCondDeleter(boost::shared_ptr<DR> reader) : reader_(reader) { }
00070        ~RCondDeleter() { }
00071     public:
00072        void operator()(DDS::ReadCondition* rcond) {
00073           reader_->delete_readcondition(rcond);
00074        }
00075 
00076     private:
00077        boost::shared_ptr<DR> reader_;
00078     };
